tenant_id.title: Tenant ID
tenant_id.description: The ERP LN cloud instance tenant ID of the Compass Data Lake.

ion_api_key.title: ION API Key (JSON)
ion_api_key.description: Your minified ION API key file (JSON contents of file "Infor Compass JDBC Driver.ionapi"). See https://youtu.be/yipG8w6qQPg

schemas.title: Schemas
schemas.description: The list of schemas to sync from. Defaults to schema "default". Case sensitive.

jdbc_url_params.title: Additional JDBC driver properties
jdbc_url_params.description: Additional properties to pass to the JDBC URL string when connecting to the database formatted as 'key=value' pairs separated by the symbol '&'. (example: key1=value1&key2=value2&key3=value3)
